sentences.english: An aerated biological filter was used to pretreat the alkaline wastewater in refinery.

sentences.english: A week-old strike now touches all 12 of France's refineries.
sentences.chinese: 一週前的罷工現在影響到法國全部12家煉油廠。

sentences.english: It is an oil-refining and industrial center.
sentences.chinese: 是一個煉油和工業中心。

sentences.english: The country’s limited refinery capacity means that it has become an importer of gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗煉油能力有限，使其成爲汽油的輸入國。

sentences.english: Oil distillation process is the first working procedure of the refinery and petrifaction enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 原油蒸餾過程是大型煉油廠和石化企業的龍頭工序。

sentences.english: The refinery fire sent a plume of thick black smoke from blazing spherical storage tanks.

sentences.english: Giant fireballs rise from a burning oil refinery in Ichi …

sentences.english: Until recently the filter residue of the effluent from the factories of catalysts for oil refining has been a pollutant to the environment.
sentences.chinese: 煉油催化劑廠排出的污水濾渣嚴重污染環境。

sentences.english: Finally, a case study in Lanzhou Refinery is brought forward.
sentences.chinese: 最後給出了在蘭州煉油化工總廠應用的實例。

sentences.english: Hot wall hydroprocessing reactor is the key equipment in oil refinery and coal liquefied.
sentences.chinese: 熱壁加氫反應器是煉油與煤液化工程的關鍵設備。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the optimization and automation of line-up in piping systems of petroleum refinery.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論煉油廠輸油管網調線的最優化與自動問題。

sentences.english: The effect of intermittent heating on some chemical parameters of refined oils used in Egypt. A public health nutrition concern.
sentences.chinese: 間歇供暖對埃及使用的精煉油中一些化學參數的影響。

sentences.english: Refining margins improved nearly across the board last quarter.
sentences.chinese: 該公司上季度煉油利潤全面提高。

sentences.english: This technology was proven to be feasible in Jinxi Petroleum Processing and Chemical Complex.
sentences.chinese: 該技術已在錦西煉油化工總廠工業應用。

sentences.english: and refiners are required to blend ethanol into their gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 同時，煉油廠還被要求將乙醇摻混到他們的汽油之中。
